name: Blue Lemonade
recipe: This unique drink combines the tanginess of fresh lemon juice with the vibrant blue hue of butterfly pea flowers.

name: Soy Glazed Cod
recipe: A delightful seafood dish featuring tender cod fillets glazed with a rich and savory soy-based sauce. This dish combines the delicate flavors of cod with a glossy, umami-packed glaze made from soy sauce, mirin, and a touch of sweetness.

name: Cheesecake
recipe: Silky, Rich, Creamy and perfectly smooth, this New York cheesecake is the dessert of your dreams!

name: Roast Duck Breast
recipe: A succulent and flavorful dish, Roast Duck Breast features tender, juicy duck cooked to perfection with a crispy, golden-brown skin. The duck is expertly seasoned with a blend of aromatic herbs and spices, then roasted to achieve a crisp exterior while maintaining a moist and tender interior.

name: Neapolitan Pizza
recipe: A classic Italian favorite, Neapolitan Pizza features a thin, crisp crust topped with simple yet flavorful ingredients. The base is a rich tomato sauce made from ripe tomatoes, complemented by fresh mozzarella cheese and a few basil leaves.

name: Chicken Burger
recipe: A delectable twist on the classic burger, the Chicken Burger features a juicy, tender chicken patty seasoned with a blend of herbs and spices. The patty is grilled or pan-fried to a perfect golden-brown and served on a toasted bun.

name: Red Velvet
recipe: Red Velvet is a visually striking and decadently rich cake, renowned for its vibrant crimson color and velvety texture. This classic dessert features layers of moist, soft cake with a subtle cocoa flavor, complemented by a tangy cream cheese frosting.
